ai.summary: Lingness is a gentle 4.9 km hike in the UK, suitable for beginners and casual walkers. The route features easy terrain, minimal elevation gain, and a relaxed pace, making it a good half-day outing with potential rural scenery.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well-defined paths with a mix of grass, gravel and dirt. Expect some compact trails and a few muddy patches after rain. The route is gently undulating, with light ascents and descents but no steep sections.
ai.safety_notes: Check the forecast and daylight hours before you go. Wear sturdy footwear and dress in layers. Stay on marked paths, carry a map or GPS, and bring water and snacks. Tell someone your plan, be mindful of livestock if encountered, and adjust plans in exposed or stormy weather.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or light hiking boots
Map or GPS device (or a fully charged phone)
ai.best_seasons: All year round, with particularly pleasant conditions in spring and autumn.

seo.title: Lingness Hike - Easy 4.9 km Walk in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Lingness, an easy 4.9 km hike in the UK. Easy terrain, scenic rural paths, and practical safety and gear tips for a relaxed half-day walk.
